/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and power lines, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of the city.
